phrases: The bad ones about you two?
And the one about me being the one who spread those rumors?
And the one about me being a secret school gang leader?
Sadako: Legend of the Secret School Gang Leader
A-Apparently I had you two backing me up,
and I even had Kazehaya under my control.
And to think you used to be cursed.”
I seriously hate all of them.
But it must be some kind of mistake.
Even if she did spread those rumors...
In rumorland, these two are backing me up,
but I am spreading slander about them...
What exactly am I trying to do?
She loses track because she is always messing around,
So what were we talking about again?
I am not the only one spreading rumors.
The Kazehaya fans made up the gang leader rumor.
This would not have been so hard if it all had worked as I would planned.
K-Kurumi-chan, that is not true, is it?
You might give people the wrong idea, saying that.
But we will understand if we talk.
You would not do such a
It is not the wrong idea.
The rumors about these two, and that you started them...
Yeah, just a little before you noticed.
You are in the way, Sawako-chan.
I wished you would get away from Chizu-chan and everyone else.
We are friends now, right, Sawako-chan?
I have never thought of you as a friend.
See, that is what she is like.
That is it, I am going crazy.
I am going to tell her.
You piss me off with what you did, but whatever.
I do not even want you to apologize.
Say what you want about me,
but do not talk about Yano-chin or Sawako like you know anything about them!
And do not ever make Sawako cry ever again!
I have had it with this rumor stuff.
I want to live like you.
And do not take advantage of people either.
It is still not fair, Sawako-chan.
What is wrong with using people?
Everyone takes advantage of me too, and then they toss me out when they are done.
Why is it wrong for me to use people?
Oh, now she is being defensive.
So you do not intend to change your ways?
You should know that I am not as simple-minded as Chizu.
You do not care if Kazehaya finds out about this?
I think I will go tell him right now.
Come on, Sawako, forget about her.
You have to tell Kazehaya about me, do not you?
Get him to feel sorry for you again.
She sort of said it earlier too.
I do not know why she would say such a thing,
but that was not really her talking.
I do not want you to tell him.
Well I am not really interested in that stuff, but...
Fine with me, if that is what you want;
She would not want someone she likes to think bad of her.
I did not think you would be so hurt by this.
but I had my own motives.
I did not know she felt that way for my sake.
I am sorry I got you into this.
We seriously do not think anything of the rumors.
But what about the rumors about you?
I am used to it, I guess.
those rumors were not all bad.
I have Chizu-chan and Ayane-chan with me.
I can tell them what I am really thinking.
What about things between me and Kurumi-chan?
Get over it, they are on the volleyball team.
She did not show up for practice either.
I wonder if she is okay.
Then again, maybe we won because Kurumi was not here.
That girl Mariko that took her place was pretty athletic.
Kurumi's not really the enthusiastic type.
She needs to fix her hair better.
I wonder if Kurumi-chan has not come back yet.
Kurumi-chan called me by my name.
I have never thought of you as a friend.
But she called me a friend.
She came to talk to me.
Truth or not, it made me happy.
You are the only person I have ever told.
There was something I wanted to tell her.
Sawako did not say anything to Kurumi earlier.
I guess we were doing all the talking, come to think of it.
and I do not know her too well...
But she told me her precious feelings.
I want to tell her mine too.
Huh, is girls' soccer over already?
Dammit, Pin would not let me go.
Oh yeah, you are on the sports day committee.
What do you mean, that” girl?
I did it again, yet another miserable woman.
You two better never fall for me.
I am not interested in kids.
You are talking to tactful kindness incarnate.
I just felt sorry for Kurumi for the first time.
What, are you here to laugh?
You better not be pitying me.
That is what I came here to tell you earlier.
That was the first time I told anyone.
I never knew it would be so embarrassing to tell your friends.
It makes me realize how much I love him.
This is how you felt when you told me.
I said I am not your friend.
Do not treat me like we are the same.
Were not you a little embarrassed?
Were not you a little happy?
When you put it into words
and when you realized that you liked him...
Why would I be happy telling you?
I said you are in my way.
You are always with Kazehaya, and you do not even have to try.
I thought I could win against you.
Because I am a lot more...
I know, she is a lot more in league with him.
I think you are cuter now than when I first met you.
It does not matter if Kazehaya does not like me.
I know he does not like me.
I have always been watching him.
I do not want to cry like this in front of you.
Because you know everything good about Kazehaya-kun.
I can talk to you about him.
I do not think I envied her just because she is pretty or because she is cool
or because she is on the same level as him.
I think it is because I thought she is cute, the way she thinks of Kazehaya-kun.
See me for who I am.
